B. The arithmetic mean of the holding period returns is 6.28%.
C. (1 - 0.0544)(1.1108)(1.0666)(1.1048)(1.0861)115 - 1 = 6.10%
D. Median = (4.3 + 4.1) / 2 = 4.2%.
E. Sample standard deviation of Emfund returns over the six years is:
{[(3 – 4.4)2 + (4 – 4.4)2 + (4.3 – 4.4)2 + (5 – 4.4)2 + (4.1 – 4.4)2 + (6 – 4.4)2] / 5}1/2
